title: What do I do with the project cores
body: I forced into icons and contents and I still got 70 of them can u guys like do something about it

replies.body:
If you have leftover materials after the PROJECT event, you'll have the chance to disenchant them for a bit of essence as mentioned in our [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I still can't disenchant my project cores
They aren't disenchantable at the moment. They will be in the future, but I don't have an exact time or date on when that will be.
